DataSource.Query: SELECT purchase.orders.order_id, purchase.orders.transaction_timestamp, purchase.orders.value_date, account.get_name_by_user_id(purchase.orders.user_id) AS entered_by, core.get_office_name_by_office_id(purchase.orders.office_id) AS office_name, purchase.orders.terms, purchase.orders.internal_memo, inventory.get_supplier_name_by_supplier_id(purchase.orders.supplier_id) AS supplier_name FROM purchase.orders WHERE purchase.orders.order_id = @order_id;

SELECT purchase.order_details.item_id, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, purchase.order_details.quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(purchase.order_details.unit_id) AS unit, purchase.order_details.price, purchase.order_details.price * purchase.order_details.quantity AS amount, purchase.order_details.discount_rate, ROUND((purchase.order_details.price * purchase.order_details.quantity) * ((100 - purchase.order_details.discount_rate)/100), 4) AS total FROM purchase.order_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = purchase.order_details.item_id WHERE purchase.order_details.order_id = @order_id ORDER BY purchase.order_details.order_detail_id;
